findings.title: Bypass the restrictions on 3 gas-free payments
findings.description: UniPass Snap allows 3 gas-free payments per address, but additional time can be added by exploiting an underflow issue in availableFreeQuota.

findings.title: UnipassID Snap does not check originTransaction's HASH and signTxMessage.message consistency
findings.description: Malicious Dapp can use this issue to forge originTransaction as a transaction with a small amount of transfers. The actual message is a transaction with a large amount of transfers, thus deceiving the user into stealing the user's assets.
